content: 24 mini mittens to use as an advent calendar or tree decorations **please note ** all 24 pdfs for these mittens are still available as free separate downloads from my site you can find links to each of them here 1 many people have asked me to put them together as one pdf that they can purchase and have in their ravelry library so that is what this is please do not post project pictures with all or most of the charts in them thanks this paid download contains 1 written pattern 24 mitten charts and a blank chart to design your own mitten it also has had the pattern tech edited and charts updated since the original free kal each mitten is about 4 5 tall and 2 25 wide not including thumb just big enough for a small gift approximate amount of yarn needed is red pimento - 77 grams - 359 yards white - 67 grams - 312 yards light grey finnley heather - 76 grams - 355 yards dark grey ash - 6 grams - 28 yards total - 226 grams - 1054 yards 1 http //www justcraftyenough com/2015/12/mitten-garland-advent-calendar-pattern-index/
